pre>code{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.05);display:block;padding:.5em;-webkit-text-size-adjust:none;overflow-x:auto;white-space:pre}.stackedit__html .toc ul{list-style-type:none;padding-left:20px}.stackedit__html table{background-color:transparent;border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0}.stackedit__html td,.stackedit__html th{border-right:1px solid #dcdcdc;padding:8px 12px}.stackedit__html td:last-child,.stackedit__html th:last-child{border-right:0}.stackedit__html td{border-top:1px solid #dcdcdc}.stackedit__html mark{background-color:#f8f840}.stackedit__html kbd{font-family:Lato,Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,sans-serif;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid rgba(63,63,63,.25);border-radius:3px;box-shadow:0 1px 0 #777;cursor:help}.stackedit__html img{max-width:100%}.stackedit__html .task-list-item{list-style-type:none}.stackedit__html .task-list-item-checkbox{margin:0 .2em 0 -1.3em}.stackedit__html .footnote{font-size:.8em;position:relative;top:-.25em;vertical-align:top}.stackedit__html .page-break-after{page-break-after:always}.stackedit__html .abc-notation-block{overflow-x:auto!important}.stackedit__html{margin-bottom:180px;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;padding-left:30px;padding-right:30px;max-width:750px}.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc ul{padding:0}.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc ul a{margin:.5rem 0;padding:.5rem 1rem}.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc ul ul{color:#888;font-size:.9em}.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc ul ul a{margin:0;padding:.1rem 1rem}.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc li{display:block}.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc a{display:block;color:inherit;text-decoration:none}.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc a:active,.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc a:focus,.stackedit__html .stackedit__toc a:hover{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.075);border-radius:3px}.stackedit__html .stackedit__left{position:fixed;display:none;width:250px;height:100%;top:0;left:0;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:auto;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;-ms-overflow-style:none}@media (min-width:1060px){.stackedit__html .stackedit__left{display:block}}.stackedit__html .stackedit__right{position:absolute;right:0;top:0;left:0}@media (min-width:1060px){.stackedit__html .stackedit__right{left:250px}}.stackedit__html .stackedit--pdf blockquote{border-left-color:#ececec}.stackedit--pdf .stackedit__html{padding-left:0;padding-right:0;max-width:none}
